sent.orig: Only those who dare to fall greatly can ever achieve greatly.
sent.trans: 只有敢于大失败，才能成就大成功。

sent.orig: Hence, the efficiency of banking has been increased greatly while banking costs are being reduced greatly.
sent.trans: 因此银行业务效率大大提高，而成本极大降低。

sent.orig: Rejoice greatly oh daughters of Zion (Soprano) 4:32 Rejoice greatly, O daughter of Zion!
sent.trans: 锡安的民哪，应当大大喜乐；耶路撒冷的民哪，应当欢呼。

sent.orig: Improve the cleaning efficiency, man-hour and traditional washing method and can relatively be shortened greatly greatly.
sent.trans: 极大提高清晰效率，清晰工时与传统的清晰方法比较可大大缩短。

sent.orig: The new algorithm decreases the computational complexity greatly, and increases the accuracy ofestimation greatly.
sent.trans: 新算法降低了计算量，提高了频偏估计精确度。
